name: @stream-io/stream-chat-css
description: Bundled CSS for Stream Chat web SDKs
author: GetStream

scripts.build-v1: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && yarn bundle-sass && yarn copy-assets && yarn copy-styles
scripts.build-v2: rm -rf dist/v2 && mkdir -p dist/v2/scss && yarn transform && yarn compile-to-css
scripts.compile-to-css: sass dist/v2/scss/index.scss dist/v2/css/index.css --style compressed && sass dist/v2/scss/index.layout.scss dist/v2/css/index.layout.css --style compressed
scripts.bundle-sass: echo '[34mℹ[0m Compiling scss files to css bundle' && sass src/v1/styles/index.scss dist/css/index.css --style compressed && echo '[32m✓[0m Finished bundling css'
scripts.copy-assets: echo '[34mℹ[0m Copying assets to distributed directory' && cp -R src/assets dist/assets && echo '[32m✓[0m Finished copying assets'
scripts.copy-styles: echo '[34mℹ[0m Copying scss files to distributed directory' && cp -R src/v1/styles dist/scss && echo '[32m✓[0m Finished copying styles'
